body_html:
Hi,
I retried compilation of tensorflow 0.11 with cuda -7.0 & cudnn 7.0
i got slightly different error:
tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:154:39: error: '::cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward' has not been declared
typedef std::add_pointer<decltype(::__name)>::type FuncPoint
Detailed error log is attached herewith.
As i am building tensorflow from source, i guess cuda-7.0 should be compatible with tf-0.11.

tensorflow_build3.log.txt

body:
Hi,
I retried compilation of tensorflow 0.11 with cuda -7.0 & cudnn 7.0
i got slightly different error:
tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc:154:39: error: '::cudnnBatchNormalizationBackward' has not been declared
     typedef std::add_pointer<decltype(::__name)>::type FuncPoint
Detailed error log is attached herewith.
As i am building tensorflow from source, i guess [cuda-7.0 should be compatible with tf-0.11.
](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html)

[tensorflow_build3.log.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/575585/tensorflow_build3.log.txt)
